creditline: Anonymous gift honoring the contributions of Eric Gustav Carlson
description: dark, scrappy winged figure with skull-like face in mid-landing, carrying human figure with long hair in a white sheet; skeleton in a robe at UR sitting on mound of bones and skulls, about to strike a bell with a mallet; river with arched bridge, village in distant background; three other figures in distance at L, also carrying humans
inscription: inscribed in pen, LRC: le état
title: Danse Macabre
